metadata.description: Specifies the name of the Azure Machine Learning workspace.
Description string.
Friendly name.
Specifies the Kind of the workspace.
Specifies the location for all resources.
Specifies the resource group name of the Azure Machine Learning workspace.
Determines the PublicNetworkAccess mode of new workspace-associated resources provisioned alongside with workspace.
Determines whether or not a new storage should be provisioned.
Name of the storage account.
Determines whether or not to put the storage account behind VNet
Determines whether or not a new key vault should be provisioned.
Name of the key vault.
Determines whether or not to put the storage account behind VNet
Determines whether or not new ApplicationInsights should be provisioned.
Name of LogAnalytics to be used by ApplicationInsights resource.
ARM Id of LogAnalytics to be used by ApplicationInsights resource.
Name of ApplicationInsights.
Determines whether or not a new container registry should be provisioned.
The container registry bind to the workspace.
Determines whether or not to put container registry behind VNet.
Determines whether or not a new VNet should be provisioned.
Name of the VNet
Address prefix of the virtual network
Determines whether or not a new subnet should be provisioned.
Name of the subnet
Subnet prefix of the virtual network
Azure Databrick workspace to be linked to the workspace
Specifies that the Azure Machine Learning workspace holds highly confidential data.
Specifies if the Azure Machine Learning workspace should be encrypted with customer managed key.
Specifies the customer managed keyVault arm id.
Specifies if the customer managed keyvault key uri.
Name of the private end point added to the workspace
Name of the resource group where the private end point is added to
The name of the compute target to use for building environment Docker images with the container registry is behind a VNet.
Whether to allow public endpoint connectivity when a workspace is private link enabled.
Whether to create a workspace with soft delete capability
Whether to allow an existing soft-deleted workspace to be recovered
The Bring-Your-Own cosmosdb account that customer brings to store data
The Bring-Your-Own storage account that customer brings to store data
The Bring-Your-Own search account that customer brings to store data
Managed identities assigned to workspace. If not specificed, SystemAssigned managed identity is the default.
ARM identifier of primary user assigned managed identity, in case multiple ones are specified. Also the default managed identity for clusterless compute.
Managed network settings to be used for the workspace. If not specified, isolation mode Disabled is the default
A flag to determine if workspace should be created/update with allow role assignment on resource group level.
spark version to be used by all feature sets
Determines whether or not to provision a feature store offline store storage account
Name of the feature store offline store storage account.
Feature store offline store container
Feature store offline store resource group
Feature store offline store subscription id
Feature store offline store config
Feature store online store resource id
Feature store online store resource group
Feature store online store subscription id
Feature store online store config
Determines whether or not to provision a materialization identity
Feature store materialization identity name
Feature store materialization identity subscription id
Feature store materialization identity resource group name
Whether to grant materialization identity permissions
A flag to determine if workspace has data isolation enabled. The flag can only be set at the creation phase, it can't be updated.
Additional configuration for WorkspaceHub.
A list of existing workspaces used by Hub to perform convert.
Resource Id of Hub used for lean workspace.
Serverless compute settings to be used for the workspace.
The authentication mode for system datastores
The resource id that this workspace hub's endpoints should reference.
The kind of endpoints this workspace hub ought to contain.
Testing value. Do not touch.
